meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the aspect of a verb that expresses the way in which an action, state, or occurrence is presented or viewed.
meanings.sent1: The aspectual analysis of the story highlighted the different viewpoints of the characters.
meanings.sent2: She had an aspectual understanding of the situation, considering all angles before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The aspectual twist in the plot made the audience gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His aspectual approach to problem-solving shed new light on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The aspectual nature of the painting captured the essence of the artist's emotions.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a particular part or feature of something.
meanings.sent1: The aspectual details of the design made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: She focused on the aspectual differences between the two products.
meanings.sent3: The aspectual color contrast added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: His aspectual analysis of the problem revealed a crucial flaw.
meanings.sent5: The aspectual beauty of the landscape took her breath away.
